content: Letta v0.16.4 (Jan 29 2026): Conversations API enables shared memory blocks across parallel agents. Sleeptime Compute: background consolidation reduces latency 91%, token costs 90%. Multi-agent patterns: async messaging, sync messaging, supervisor-worker. Claude Flow v3: 352x WASM speedup, 171 MCP tools, HNSW 150x-12500x faster search, 75-80% token reduction. Opik v1.10.5: 37+ RAG metrics, LLM-as-judge evaluation. Voyage-3-large: #1 embeddings across 8 domains, 32K context (4x Jina), binary quantization 200x storage savings.
